name: MIRROR MIRROR IN OUR BRAIN
description:
- A SIAMESE SIMULATION GAME 

 In a world full of anomalies, you are the main one itself. Enter an unknown world in a shared body. Your eyes are playing tricks on you, you don‘t have full control over your body and somehow nothing feels like it used to. 

 Try to focus on the task, because time is running and all you want to do is escape. Birds will catch your attention. 

 If you manage to collect them all, you will not only get yourself some extra time, you also have successfully beaten the game and your final wish -freedom- will be fulfilled.
